header: ORDER BELOW EXH. 1 IN CRIMINAL BAIL APPLN. NO. 180/2019 Perused the anticipatory bail application of Anushri Anand Savant, and say thereon. Perused case diary. Heard the learned Advocate Shri. Mundada for the applicant / accused and APP Shri. Salvi for the State, Investigating Officer and Advocate Shri. Ganu for the original complainant.

background.text: 2] It is the case of the prosecution that Reshma Sahdeo Shinde @ Anushri Sawant was working with complainant company since 2010 as an Accountant. By forging documents and signatures she has misappropriated the amount and credited in bank account with her mother Sunanda Sahadeo Shinde. They have misappropriated an amount of Rs. 1.73 lakhs thereby, committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 420, 406, 467, 471, 201 of Indian Penal Code which registered as CR No. 297/2018 with Dattawadi Police Station.

legalActFound.stringMatched: under sec/s. 420, 406, 467, 471, 201 of indian penal code

arguments.text: 3] The learned Counsel for the applicant submitted that accounts of the company was audited. There were pdf statements. No customers of the company have made any complaint against the accused. Applicant has supplied all three accounts to Investigating Officer. As accused purchased Row House, complainant suspected upon her. She has also filed her income tax returns. Complainant Namjoshi used to go to China. He used to purchase in the name of Bipin Engineering. He used to purchase dollar. There is no misappropriation of any amount. All the documents are with the police. Her house is searched but no incriminating material was found.

argumentSentences.text: 3] The learned Counsel for the applicant submitted that accounts of the company was audited.
There were pdf statements.
No customers of the company have made any complaint against the accused.
Applicant has supplied all three accounts to Investigating Officer.
As accused purchased Row House, complainant suspected upon her.
She has also filed her income tax returns.
Complainant Namjoshi used to go to China.
He used to purchase in the name of Bipin Engineering.
He used to purchase dollar.
There is no misappropriation of any amount.
All the documents are with the police.
Her house is searched but no incriminating material was found.

arguments.text: 4] The learned APP Shri. Salvi submitted as per their say. He submitted that applicant joined as Accountant on monthly payment of Rs. 8000/­. Her monthly salary is time to time increased and she was drawing Rs. 16000/­ p.m. in the year 2015. Accused has purchased Row House of Rs. 1 croer at Bibwewadi and falt of Rs 15 to 20 lakh at Ratnagiri. Hard disk is lying with her. I.P Address is also known to her. Applicant has not cooperated with police.

argumentSentences.text: 4] The learned APP Shri.
Salvi submitted as per their say.
He submitted that applicant joined as Accountant on monthly payment of Rs. 8000/­.
Her monthly salary is time to time increased and she was drawing Rs. 16000/­ p.m. in the year 2015.
Accused has purchased Row House of Rs. 1 croer at Bibwewadi and falt of Rs 15 to 20 lakh at Ratnagiri.
Hard disk is lying with her.
I.P Address is also known to her.
Applicant has not cooperated with police.

arguments.text: 5] Applicant undoubtedly was serving with complainant company as an accountant. Complainant used to remain out of country. Applicant might had purchased row house at Bibwewadi and flat at Ratnagiri. She has also filed income tax returns. Complainant has filed his account in excel sheet and tried to show the alleged withdrawal from the account of the company and credited in the account of applicant. The said sheet since in respect of withdrawal by cash or by self withdrawal, since 2010 – 2011 till 2017­2018. No bank account of the complainant or the accused is placed on record by the prosecution. Merely because, the applicant had purchased row house and flat of huge amount, it cannot be said that she has misappropriated the amount from the complainant company. Documents are lying with the bank. Computer might be lying with the company of the complainant. Therefore, in my view custodial interrogation of the applicant accused is not required. Hence, I proceed to pass the following order.

argumentSentences.text: 5] Applicant undoubtedly was serving with complainant company as an accountant.
Complainant used to remain out of country.
Applicant might had purchased row house at Bibwewadi and flat at Ratnagiri.
She has also filed income tax returns.
Complainant has filed his account in excel sheet and tried to show the alleged withdrawal from the account of the company and credited in the account of applicant.
The said sheet since in respect of withdrawal by cash or by self withdrawal, since 2010 – 2011 till 2017­2018.
No bank account of the complainant or the accused is placed on record by the prosecution.
Merely because, the applicant had purchased row house and flat of huge amount, it cannot be said that she has misappropriated the amount from the complainant company.
Documents are lying with the bank.
Computer might be lying with the company of the complainant.
Therefore, in my view custodial interrogation of the applicant accused is not required.
Hence, I proceed to pass the following order.

order.text: ORDER 1] The application is allowed. 2] In the event of arrest of applicant Anushri Anand Savant CR No. 297/2018 with Dattawadi Police Station. sections under Sec/s. 420, 406, 467, 471, 201 of Indian Penal Code she be released on her executing P.R. Bond of Rs.20,000/­ with solvent surety of the like amount. 3] The applicant shall co­operate the I. O. during the investigation and he shall remain present before I. O. as and when required for interrogation. 4] The applicant immediately shall attend police station during 2.00 p.m to 5.00 p.m. on 24.01.2019 and 25.01.2019 and to help Investigating Officer in investigation. 5] The applicant shall not directly or indirectly make any inducement, threat or promise to any person acquainted with the facts of accusation against him so as to dissuade her from disclosing such facts either to the Court or to any police officer. 6] The applicant shall not leave State of Maharashtra without the previous permission of the Court

processedText:
ORDER BELOW EXH. 1 IN CRIMINAL BAIL APPLN. NO. 180/2019 Perused the anticipatory bail application of Anushri Anand Savant, and say thereon. Perused case diary. Heard the learned Advocate Shri. Mundada for the applicant / accused and APP Shri. Salvi for the State, Investigating Officer and Advocate Shri. Ganu for the original complainant. 
---header-ends---
2] It is the case of the prosecution that Reshma Sahdeo Shinde @ Anushri Sawant was working with complainant company since 2010 as an Accountant. By forging documents and signatures she has misappropriated the amount and credited in bank account with her mother Sunanda Sahadeo Shinde. They have misappropriated an amount of Rs. 1.73 lakhs thereby, committed an offence punishable under Sec/s. 420, 406, 467, 471, 201 of Indian Penal Code which registered as CR No. 297/2018 with Dattawadi Police Station. 
---background-ends---
3] The learned Counsel for the applicant submitted that accounts of the company was audited. There were pdf statements. No customers of the company have made any complaint against the accused. Applicant has supplied all three accounts to Investigating Officer. As accused purchased Row House, complainant suspected upon her. She has also filed her income tax returns. Complainant Namjoshi used to go to China. He used to purchase in the name of Bipin Engineering. He used to purchase dollar. There is no misappropriation of any amount. All the documents are with the police. Her house is searched but no incriminating material was found. 
---argument-ends---
4] The learned APP Shri. Salvi submitted as per their say. He submitted that applicant joined as Accountant on monthly payment of Rs. 8000/­. Her monthly salary is time to time increased and she was drawing Rs. 16000/­ p.m. in the year 2015. Accused has purchased Row House of Rs. 1 croer at Bibwewadi and falt of Rs 15 to 20 lakh at Ratnagiri. Hard disk is lying with her. I.P Address is also known to her. Applicant has not cooperated with police. 
---argument-ends---
5] Applicant undoubtedly was serving with complainant company as an accountant. Complainant used to remain out of country. Applicant might had purchased row house at Bibwewadi and flat at Ratnagiri. She has also filed income tax returns. Complainant has filed his account in excel sheet and tried to show the alleged withdrawal from the account of the company and credited in the account of applicant. The said sheet since in respect of withdrawal by cash or by self withdrawal, since 2010 – 2011 till 2017­2018. No bank account of the complainant or the accused is placed on record by the prosecution. Merely because, the applicant had purchased row house and flat of huge amount, it cannot be said that she has misappropriated the amount from the complainant company. Documents are lying with the bank. Computer might be lying with the company of the complainant. Therefore, in my view custodial interrogation of the applicant accused is not required. Hence, I proceed to pass the following order. 
---argument-ends---
ORDER 1] The application is allowed. 2] In the event of arrest of applicant Anushri Anand Savant CR No. 297/2018 with Dattawadi Police Station. sections under Sec/s. 420, 406, 467, 471, 201 of Indian Penal Code she be released on her executing P.R. Bond of Rs.20,000/­ with solvent surety of the like amount. 3] The applicant shall co­operate the I. O. during the investigation and he shall remain present before I. O. as and when required for interrogation. 4] The applicant immediately shall attend police station during 2.00 p.m to 5.00 p.m. on 24.01.2019 and 25.01.2019 and to help Investigating Officer in investigation. 5] The applicant shall not directly or indirectly make any inducement, threat or promise to any person acquainted with the facts of accusation against him so as to dissuade her from disclosing such facts either to the Court or to any police officer. 6] The applicant shall not leave State of Maharashtra without the previous permission of the Court 
---order-ends---
